title: MY account hacked and then banned
body: my account was recently hacked and then the rp points I had were gone thanks to the hacker gifting himself and then I reported that to riot. and now I come to find that my account is banned. and unfortunately for me I don't have the password to the email. Riot why did u ban me I just don't understand I'm the one who got hacked and lost money but instead u let the user ---   get away going into my account and gifting himself with my riotpoints also my friends ---  and ----  were telling him to stop so he blocked them and you don't give back my riotpoints instead you ban me

replies.body:
Yes this did happen to him. I was playing a game a few days ago with Babsey and all of a sudden he leaves the game and can't log in, after a few attempts he was able to get in and play. Later on that day Babsey stopped playing but some one went on his account. The user also gifted himself 2500 worth of RP. Some one has hacked or has my friends account which resulted him to get perma-banned for no reason.
Pls Help My friend Riot.
thank you for you support bearbeast
It's normal for an account to get banned if compromised to stop the hacker from doing more harm until they know its safely back in the true owner's hands.

I've removed those names for security reasons.  Our account team would like to help you get your account back and repair as much as possible!  Hit us up through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and we'll work with you individually towards resolving this.  We'll see you there!

You don't want to share personal info through a pubic venue like the boards, and can play a part towards accounts getting compromised.    Submitting this in your form will be your best bet.  In the meantime, I suggest going through the [account protection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account) for some good account safety practices.  Good luck!

I heard that Babsey got his account back, thanks for helping fast. 
Much appreciated.
